name.baseName: Salted vegetables, pickles, sweet and sour pickles, shrimp oil pickles, bran pickles ; Mustard, leafy vegetables, beans, onions and garlic, roots and tubers, squash heads ; Washing + pickling/salting + desalting + dehydration + soaking ; All sizes; NESPS2
盐渍菜、泡菜、糖醋渍菜、虾油渍菜、糟糠渍菜 ; 芥菜类、叶菜类、豆类、葱蒜类、根茎类、榨菜头 ; 水洗+腌制/盐渍+脱盐+脱水+渍制 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集代表了盐渍菜（包括盐渍的、糖醋的、虾油的和糠醛的多种类型）生产过程中的各个阶段，包括芥菜、叶菜、豆类、葱蒜、根茎类蔬菜的使用。工艺包括清洗、腌制/盐渍、脱盐、脱水和浸泡。此外，数据描述了减少废水中氨氮和化学需氧量（COD）污染水平的末端处理技术，包括厌氧和好氧生物处理、化学混凝与如序批式反应器（SBR）和生物接触氧化等多种生物过程的结合，以及沉淀分离。数据提供了每种处理方法的技术效率信息和废气治理设施运行率的计算方法。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码1371文件，在完整版文件中第2634页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为盐渍菜、泡菜、糖醋渍菜、虾油渍菜、糟糠渍菜，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是厌氧生物+好氧生物处理法，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/污水治理设施总功率（千瓦）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisChemical coagulation + SBR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是化学混凝+SBR法，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/污水治理设施总功率（千瓦）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisChemical coagulation + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management75
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是化学混凝+好氧生物处理法，其效率为75，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/污水治理设施总功率（千瓦）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisChemical coagulation + bio-contact oxidation process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management75
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是化学混凝+生物接触氧化法，其效率为75，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/污水治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/污水治理设施总功率（千瓦）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPrecipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management10
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是沉淀分离，其效率为10，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=1。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
